RIDAGEYR.label: Age in years at screening
RIDAGEYR.text: Age in years of the participant at the time of screening. Individuals 80 and over are topcoded at 80 years of age.
RIDAGEYR.target: Both males and females 0 YEARS - 150 YEARS

RIDAGEYR_BUCKET.label: Bucketed Age
RIDAGEYR_BUCKET.formula: 14 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 19 else ( 24 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 29 else ( 34 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 39 else ( 44 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 49 else ( 54 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 59 else ( 64 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 69 else ( 74 if ##RIDAGEYR <= 79 else 80 ) ) ) ) ) )
